articles.author: Richard Fay
articles.title: Kevin De Bruyne made Cristiano Ronaldo request after Man City thrashed Manchester United - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester City star Kevin De Bruyne made a request to Cristiano Ronaldo following the emphatic 6-3 derby win.
articles.content:
Kevin De Bruyne had a derby day to remember as Man City thrashed Manchester United on Sunday afternoon, and after the match he was given a memento to cherish as well.
